top_comments.comment: I really didn't know what to think until the end and I'm glad I watched this video entirely!!!!! It looked like it was really difficult to design and even though I would have done many things diffrently it looks so great all together. Well done ♥

comments_since_last_sample.body: James is so adorable
Awesome as always! Where can I find the ceiling hook?

Not sure if there actually was space to do so but I kept thinking a very narrow sofa table with drawers at the end of the bed would offer separation and additional storage. Kirkland’s has some great ones. Overall this makeover is a fantastic upgrade and adds great personality! This was a very challenging space to work with but I think y’all did a great job!
I love Olivia’s glasses!
I think this is my favourite makeover ever! Looove it!
James needs to be on camera more please 💕
Great job 👏
This is very cute!  One peav, the TV console looks heavy to the floor and is low for veiwing.  Legs would have been nice or maybe another one for height and hidden storage.
So many excellent products in this makeover, Team AG. Spent an hour shopping after watching 😅
Totally digging the transformation
Great job. Love how you talk us through your thought process. I thought the storage at the foot of the bed was off and you verbalized it and talked us through the changes.
Loved, loved, loved this makeover!
With all the landlord's restrictions, you did a great job.  Looking hip and stylish!!
So cute, and such a vibe!!!
What a nice finished look!  So cozy and with the right "pop" of color.  For a very small space, you nailed the design Alexandra.
James!!!!! I love him! And Xico too. I thought he left for good a while ago. Hope he gets better soon!

I really didn't know what to think until the end and I'm glad I watched this video entirely!!!!! It looked like it was really difficult to design and even though I would have done many things diffrently it looks so great all together. Well done ♥

It's such a tiny space and youand Team AG made it look crisp, spacious and modern. I loved the the plant seperator - so creative - and use of colour in the bedroom - whereas the rest of the space was monotone. It really seperated the spaces without being obvious. Lovely job Team Ag and hope Xico heals soon...not quite the complete team without him 😃

If ever I make it to Canada can I apply as your intern? I am seriously inspired by everything you do! Thank you for getting me through covid (watched all your vids while I was sick) and for inspiring me to pursue my design and digital career dreams. Love from the Philippines!
